home.title: Welcome to the application for automatically creating and populating projects in Jira
home.description1: Set up your new project in a few easy steps and let the app take care of the rest.
home.feature2: Automatic addition of sprints, epics, and tasks
home.feature3: Assigning tasks to epics and sprints
home.feature4: Jira account and Jira API key
home.feature5: Google account and Gemini API key
home.description4: Simply provide a description of your project in the form, and the app will take care of the rest, creating all necessary elements in Jira.

form.jiraUserJiraUrl: Base url address of user's Jira (*.jira.net)
form.geminiMessage: Write what project you want to create (e.g., a program for managing a kayak rental service)

processInProgress.message: Please be patient, the process may take a few minutes...

processSuccess.title: Operation completed successfully
processSuccess.message: You can now proceed to review the created project.
